title: Beach Clean-up – Foz do Douro
summary: 2–3h coastal clean with light sorting & micro-audit.
description: Safety briefing, gloves/bags provided, simple categorisation (plastics, glass, mixed). Great for families; contributes to NGO datasets.

title: Riverbank Litter Snapshot
summary: Photo-map hotspots and tally micro-plastics on short sections.
description: Light citizen-science: geotag photos, note litter types/volumes. Results feed local partners to track pollution patterns.

title: Community Gardens Boost
summary: Weeding, mulching, native planting in open garden sessions.
description: Seasonal tasks; tools provided. No experience needed. Helps gardens stay healthy between municipal rounds.

title: Invasive Plants – Serras do Porto
description: Training and PPE on site. Moderate activity; aim is to restore small patches while documenting impact.
